definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: S (e) in; name of wilderness S. of Canaan, where lay Kadesh Barnea, c. [[ה]] loc. [[חִ֫נָה]] Nu 34:4 (where Lag:BN 47 [[חחן]]), Jos 15:3 (van d. H. [[חִ֫נׇּה]] in Jos); elsewh. [[מִדְבַּר־חִן]] Nu 13:21, Nu 20:1, Nu 27:14, Nu 27:14, Nu 33:36, Nu 34:3, De 32:51, Jos 15:1 (all P).
